page.title: 14THE VILLAGE OF HEATH HAYES
page.content: Heath Hayes is a very small village but it is growing larger all the time because of new housing estates. There are a lot of lanes around Heath Hayes to walk down. Heath Hayes used to be an old mining village. It has got 1 library, which is quite big and it has a childrens' as well as adults sections of books to entertain people of all ages. Heath Hayes also has a good variety of food shops covering all manner of foods. It also has many parks, one of the biggest is at the Five Ways roundabout. There are also a lot of football pitches. There are hairdressers, dentists, doctors and it has three fish and chip shops ass well as a supermarket. It also has a church called St. John's and a chapel which holds Brownies. Rachel Billings. Age 10yrs.
